医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现服用索马鲁肽的女性平均体重减轻量比男性多研究人员对索马鲁肽对肥胖和心力衰竭患者的治疗效果进行了二次分析，该计划采用保留的左心室射血分数计划，其中包括糖尿病患者，并按生物性别分层。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-women-lost-more-of-their-body-weight-on-average-with-semaglutide-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-women-lost-more-of-their-body-weight-on-average-with-semaglutide-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4fd5f92-2511-4f5b-8989-c98c14d1b6cf Wed, 26 Jun 2024 05:58:00 -0400 Study finds women lost more of their body weight on average with semaglutide than men
黑色素瘤消息：社交媒体是皮肤癌交流的有用工具研究人员评估了有效教育公众并提高进行皮肤检查意愿的健康传播信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Melanoma-messages-Social-media-a-useful-tool-for-skin-cancer-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Melanoma-messages-Social-media-a-useful-tool-for-skin-cancer-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5b2e9c5-f6c5-4fdd-aa0e-40abe0e0706c Wed, 26 Jun 2024 05:15:00 -0400 Melanoma messages: Social media a useful tool for skin cancer communication
Sapio Sciences 推出 Sapio GMP LIMS，为独特的制造工艺提供无与伦比的灵活性Sapio Sciences 宣布其高度灵活、无代码/低代码 LIMS 的关键新功能，以支持必须遵守 GMP、21 CFR 11 和欧盟附件 11 标准的实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-offering-unmatched-flexibility-for-unique-manufacturing-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-offering-unmatched-flexibility-for-unique-manufacturing-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b10e0aa-0976-443a-98c2-1fd422c86863 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 04:58:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences introduces Sapio GMP LIMS offering unmatched flexibility for unique manufacturing processes

研究发现，摄入更多的超加工食品会增加癌症死亡风险超加工食品 (UPF) 消费与胃肠道 (GI) 癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-found-to-increase-cancer-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Higher-intake-of-ultra-processed-foods-found-to-increase-cancer-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9768db89-9ad2-471b-8ae5-2b9aac1edbd1 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 04:41:00 -0400 Higher intake of ultra-processed foods found to increase cancer mortality risk
ELRIG UK 与蛋白质协会合作推进药物发现中的蛋白质科学合作伙伴将于 2024 年 11 月 18 日至 19 日在英国剑桥举办“药物发现中的蛋白质科学”联合会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/ELRIG-UK-and-The-Protein-Society-Partner-to-advance- Protein-sciences-in-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/ELRIG-UK-and-The-Protein-Society-Partner-to-advance- Protein-sciences-in-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255ab86c-890a-4e27-869d-0e0d4a6ec022 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 04:39:00 -0400 ELRIG UK and The Protein Society Partner to advance protein sciences in drug discovery
新药替泽帕肽显着改善睡眠呼吸暂停和减肥替泽帕肽对患有肥胖症和中重度阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的成人的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-drug-tirzepatide-significantly-improves-sleep-apnea-and-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-drug-tirzepatide-significantly-improves-sleep-apnea-and-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e9cb874-9f29-4b9a-84a5-1a5108f141ba Wed, 26 Jun 2024 04:14:00 -0400 New drug tirzepatide significantly improves sleep apnea and weight loss
液芯纤维在医用纺织品中提供长期药物输送直接就地治疗伤口或炎症具有明显的优势：活性成分立即达到目标，并且对身体未受影响的部位没有副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Liquid-core-fibres-offer-long-term-drug-delivery-in-medical-textiles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Liquid-core-fibres-offer-long-term-drug-delivery-in-medical-textiles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73cb492f-67e7-44c2-bd7e-d321817995b9 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:47:11 -0400 Liquid core fibers offer long-term drug delivery in medical textiles
膳食纤维促进肠道细菌对色氨酸的有益转化我们通过食用水果、蔬菜和全谷物获得健康的膳食纤维。但为什么纤维对我们如此有益呢？一组研究人员发现，膳食纤维通过影响结肠中细菌的行为，在确定健康和有害物质的产生平衡方面发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Dietary-fibre-promotes-beneficial-conversion-of-tryptophan-by-gut-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Dietary-fibre-promotes-beneficial-conversion-of-tryptophan-by-gut-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52875ecb-fd54-4ba5-91db-bac1567f07b6 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:34:02 -0400 Dietary fiber promotes beneficial conversion of tryptophan by gut bacteria
Primerdesign推出新的牡蛎诺如病毒检测方法Primerdesign（Novacyt 集团旗下）是一家专注于设计、制造、验证和供应实时 PCR 试剂盒和试剂的公司，今天推出了用于牡蛎中诺如病毒的 Genesig® Easy_oys 检测试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Primerdesign-launches-new-assay-for-norovirus-detection-in-oysters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Primerdesign-launches-new-assay-for-norovirus-detection-in-oysters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d695e5e9-18d0-4ba7-9c4e-2a12d9f91b16 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:19:00 -0400 Primerdesign launches new assay for norovirus detection in oysters
